extracted_playbook.title: Identify Affected System and Version
extracted_playbook.description: Check if the system is affected by retrieving the installed version of QTS or QuTS hero.

extracted_playbook.condition: Is the system affected by the vulnerability?

extracted_playbook.title: Update to Fixed Version
extracted_playbook.description: Update the affected QTS or QuTS hero system to version 5.1.7.2770 build 20240520 or later to fix the vulnerability.

affected_products: QTS QTS 5.1.x (fixed version is QTS 5.1.7.2770 build 20240520 and later)
QuTS hero h5.1.x (fixed version is QuTS hero h5.1.7.2770 build 20240520 and later)
